title: The Generosity Experiment
description: In this inspiring talk at the NextGen:Charity conference, Sasha Dichter of the Acumen Fund shares the results of his month-long "Generosity Experiment" where he said "yes" to every request for help.
author: Sasha Dichter
keywords: TED, talks, business, global issues, philanthropy
